item.title: Ban Appeal Please unban me!!!!

item.content:encoded: I am very sorry for cursing, the reason I had to curse was that someone on the OpPison was pissing me off (even Admin will be pissed), i sincerely very much apologize for saying that i promise i will never curse again, and if i do please ban me forever.

item.title: Improve the anticheat
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hicrie)
item.dc:creator: Hicrie
item.content:encoded: Since the new season has started hackers have gone crazy.They fly and use killaura like they are in singleplayer.If not using these hacks they use aimbot and autoclicker.There are so many hackers now that reporting is no longer a choice.So i belive improving the anticheat will help solve the problem.I hope you will agree with me.TY for reading my thread

item.title: Reward Summary 3x-4x bigger than real
item.author: invalid@example.com (ItsAlek)
item.dc:creator: ItsAlek
item.content:encoded: I want to ask why Reward summary for tokens is 3x-4x more than real tokens we get from mining. I get 30k tokens summary but i reality i get only maybe 6k-9k thanks.

item.title: SCAM
item.author: invalid@example.com (delet557)
item.dc:creator: delet557
item.content:encoded:
I bought a key and thought I would trade it with someone. So I wrote in the chat and the player _Lined wrote to me that he would trade it for a good pickaxe. so i told him yes and when i gave him the key he disconnected from the server and gave me nothing. Is there anything you can do about it?

Thanks.


delet557

item.title: When are you going to fix OP Prison ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (RikkoTroom)
item.dc:creator: RikkoTroom
item.content:encoded:
Hello Pika Network community,

I hope this message finds you well. I want to start by saying that Pika Network is a fantastic Minecraft server with an amazing community and great potential. However, I believe it's essential to have an open and honest conversation about a concern that has been on the minds of many players lately - the performance of the server and staff team.

We all know that the staff team plays a crucial role in maintaining a healthy and enjoyable server environment. They...

Read more

item.title: OP Prison Guide
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ungluecklicher)
item.dc:creator: Ungluecklicher
item.content:encoded:
OP Prison Guide​



OP Prison is a game mode on PikaNetwork where your goal is to mine resources in order to make money, tokens, gems and beacons and use it to rank up or purchase something on the server. Let's give you a tour and some commands that can be used in this game mode.

Various commands can help you enhance your Prison experience. Most (if not all) of them are listed below:

Commands:
  • /help - It will show various commands that are useful to the...

Read more

item.title: My Pickaxe Disappeared Need Help!

item.dc:creator: WalkStep
item.content:encoded:
So today i hopped to my friend cell to give him My pickaxe he asked so, when i throw to him the pickaxe got under the wool block
We both mined everyblock but still didnt fount pickaxe
So PLEASE HELP ME!!!
It was a p2 pick with max enchants and facility 2 the name was "insane explosive pickaxe"
Moderator Please help!
